text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Alright, we're starting this year's event！ The Spring Fan Appreciation Festival！

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: The Tracen Marathon is in a dead heat！ Which Uma Musume will cross the goal here at the gate first！？

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Everyone, next we'll go with the 『Fight O』 rhythmn！ Let's give our all to cheer them on！ One-two！！

text_block_list.name: Festival Fans
text_block_list.text: Fight Oー！！

text_block_list.name: Commentator
text_block_list.text: Following on from the first place Uma Musume, the rest approach the goal！ The final Uma Musume has reached the gate and the goal！！

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: Haaa…… haaa…… Ehehe. King, thanks for cheering. I was able to make it to the end because of it. I could hear your voice the entire time I was running……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: It wasn't just me cheering. The fans that wanted you to make it across the goal, they helped with that.

text_block_list.name: Festival Fans
text_block_list.text: Good workー！ Good job out thereー！ You're an inspiration～！！

text_block_list.name: Cat-eyed Horsegirl
text_block_list.text: ……eh？ Ehehe…… you're right. There were a lot of people cheering for me……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……That's right, make sure you take it all in. Alright…… Cheer Squad, gather up！！ We're moving to the next event！！

text_block_list.name: Nature&Pearl
text_block_list.text: Hurray！ Hurray！！ Tr-a-ce-n！！

text_block_list.name: Spectating Fan A
text_block_list.text: Ooh～, this year they're goin' all out too～. Even the other participants too, looks like they're really having fun……

text_block_list.name: Seeking the Pearl
text_block_list.text: You're welcome to join too～～♪ I can feel that you want to cheer too！ It's fine to just cheer as you like！

text_block_list.name: Spectating Fan A
text_block_list.text: Eh, eeeh…… b-but, I don't know the call though……

text_block_list.name: Seeking the Pearl
text_block_list.text: Don't worry about it！ I'll teach you the call, and it's fine if you just copy what we do. Let's just enjoy it and have fun♪ One, two！

text_block_list.name: Pearl&Fan
text_block_list.text: Oooh, Tracen！ Tracen Fight Oー！！

text_block_list.name: Spectating Fan B
text_block_list.text: Fufuu, seems like the cheers are pretty intense～！ Maybe I'll join in too！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……！ By all means！ If you need it, we have cards for the songs, so make sure you enjoy it to the fullest！

text_block_list.name: Fan Holding a Fan B
text_block_list.text: Sounds like this year's Festival, everyone cheering is really going all out～

text_block_list.name: Fan Holding A Fan C
text_block_list.text: I know！ I even ended up joining in～！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: (……the visitors' eyes are all sparkling. Amazing…… so this is the power of King-san's cheering……！)

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ……King-san, I willー

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: ーdefinitely make it to the end！ No matter what hardships await me…… just like you！

text_block_list.name: Kawakami Princess
text_block_list.text: And I'll run to ensure the fans are delighted！！

text_block_list.name: Fan Festival Committee Member
text_block_list.text: Excuse me！ Participants for the 『Scavenger Hunt, 4000m Obstacle Course』 we have an announcement！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ……now that the morning events have wrapped up, the number of events has suddenly increased. A bicycle race by the front gate, and a Quiz show in the gym at the same time……

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Looks like we have to split up. Can I leave the Bicycle race cheering to Nature-san and Pearl-senpai？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Okayー. So King'll be cheering in the gym. After that is the 『Scavenger Hunt, 4000m Obstacle Course』 so, we'll join back up at the course then？

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Kingー！ I was doing an inspection, and it looks like someone in the Cheer Squad left this behind！！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: ！ S-sorry about that！！ We've just been hurrying around this whole time……

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: At times like that you just need to take a deep breath！ Last year, when I needed to calm down, I was told that a lot！！

text_block_list.name: Seeking the Pearl
text_block_list.text: Nature, it's about time we headed out, it's almost time.

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Oh, sorry about that. We'll be off then！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Right, do your best！ Alright everyone, let's get moving！ Let's get to our places and make sure we keep working hard with the fans to cheer everyone on！

text_block_list.name: Cheer Squad Members
text_block_list.text: Osu！

text_block_list.name: King Halo
text_block_list.text: Senpai, thanks for your advice！ Please keep watching over us as we continue to cheer！！

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: ……got it！ Hehe, aren't you quite the reliable one now？

text_block_list.name: Disciplinary Committee Member
text_block_list.text: Excuse me, chairman！！ I was just on patrol and it seems like this was left behind……

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: Oh. This is――

text_block_list.name: Bamboo Memory
text_block_list.text: ……they must really be short-handed, huh？ How about we take a little detour？ ……Hm？

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Hurray, hurray！ Fight O, Tracen！ Hoooo～～！！

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: (Nyaaa～！ So Em-bar-rass-ing but…… Since the captain asked me like that, I have no choice but to keep cheering！)

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: Everyone― make sure to stay hydrated and get something to eat！ So we can make it to the end without――

text_block_list.name: Announcer
text_block_list.text: 『This is an announcement from the Fan Appreciation Festival Executive Committee. In regards to the 『Scavenger Hunt, 4000m Obstacle Course』 scheduleded for 1PM――』

text_block_list.name: Nice Nature
text_block_list.text: ――………………eh. Isn't that――……
